BackstoryDef.title: Wraith child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: From their first breath, [PAWN_nameDef] was groomed in the cold corridors of a hive ship. Lessons included ambush tactics, sarcasm, and how to drain life energy without spilling too much. Playtime was... intense.

BackstoryDef.title: Wraith queen
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Hive Queen—ruler, strategist, and fashion icon of the Wraith empire. They command with elegance, cruelty, and a voice that can flay egos at fifty paces. Their hive is their kingdom, and everyone else is just takeout.

BackstoryDef.title: Wraith commander
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] earned their rank through cunning, combat, and impressive hair. As second-in-command to a Hive Queen, they manage logistics, motivate troops, and occasionally remind subordinates not to eat each other without permission.

BackstoryDef.title: Wraith warrior
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] lives for the hunt. As a warrior caste member, they specialize in ambushes, close-quarters brutality, and deeply unsettling stares. Thinking is optional—fighting is not.
